Binary: libdrm-dev, libdrm2, libdrm-common, libdrm2-udeb, libdrm-intel1, libdrm-nouveau2, libdrm-radeon1, libdrm-omap1, libdrm-freedreno1, libdrm-exynos1, libdrm-tegra0, libdrm-amdgpu1, libdrm-etnaviv1
